00023                 {
00024                         $_COOKIE[$name] = $value;
00025                         setcookie($name, $value, $expires, $path, $domain, $secure);

00027                 
00033                 public static function get($name)
00034                 {
00035                         if (isset($_COOKIE[$name]))
00036                         {
00037                                 return $_COOKIE[$name];
00038                         }
00039                         return NULL;
00040                 }

00051                 public static function delete($name)
00052                 {
00053                         setcookie($name, '', Time::yesterday(), '/', NULL, FALSE);
00054                 }
